fighter.script:
(let [d 2
	  hostiles (foes-in-range 100)
	  target (first hostiles)]
      (if target
      	  (do
            (intercept target 2)	  
	    (fire-all target))))

(let [d 2
	  hostiles (foes-in-range 100)
	  target (first hostiles)]
      (if target
      	  (do
            (intercept target 2)	  
	    (fire-all target))))
